snippet: Newt Gingrich used the consultancy, the Center for Health Transformations, to make millions after he left Congress.
abstract: Newt Gingrich used the consultancy, the Center for Health Transformations, to make millions after he left Congress.

byline.original: By GERRY MULLANY and MIKE MCINTIRE

headline.main: Former Gingrich Consultancy Files for Bankruptcy
